LaTeXMLUrl_description.message: This preference contains the URL of the LaTeXML Web service to use for the LaTeX to MathML conversion.

LaTeXMLPreload_description.message: Default preload list to pass to the LaTeXML server.

LaTeXMLMaxAttempts_title.message: Maximum number of attempts for LaTeXML

LaTeXMLMaxAttempts_description.message: The LaTeXML Web service may fail to convert the LaTeX input due to networking issue. This allows specifying a maximum number of attempts for each mathematical formula before giving up.

LaTeXMLCache_description.message: If this option is enabled, the add-on will cache the MathML output returned by LaTeXML. Note that disabling this option will clear the current cache.

LaTeX_Delimiters_description.message: This script handles the case where images have LaTeX source with delimiters as alt text and can be enumerated by a list of CSS selectors.

LaTeX_Delimiters_option_selectors_descri.message: A comma-separated list of CSS selectors to enumerate the img tags to convert.

LaTeX_Delimiters_option_useDisplayAttrib.message: If this option is enabled, mathematical formulas with display delimiters will get attribute display='true'. Otherwise, they will only get attribute displaystyle='true'.

LaTeX_Delimiters_option_preloadList_desc.message: Preload list to pass to the LaTeXML server.

LaTeX_NoDelimiters_description.message: This script handles the case where images have LaTeX source without delimiters as alt text and can be enumerated by a list of CSS selectors.

LaTeX_NoDelimiters_option_selectorsInlin.message: A comma-separated list of CSS selectors to enumerate the img tags to convert into inline equations.
CSS Selectors for inline equations in display style
A comma-separated list of CSS selectors to enumerate the img tags to convert into inline equations in display style.

LaTeX_NoDelimiters_option_selectorsDispl.message: A comma-separated list of CSS selectors to enumerate the img tags to convert into display equations.

LaTeX_NoDelimiters_option_preloadList_de.message: Preload list to pass to the LaTeXML server.

addRulePanel_addRule.message: Add an Image to MathML rule
